title: Create a VirtualizingWrapPanel
body: I'd love to see a VirtualizingWrapPanel included by default in the framework. WrapPanel is very handy as an ItemsPanel, but its lack of virtualization can be problematic.

comments.body: I also agree with it. We want display multiple items in a row. We can't use StackPanel every time, but if use WrapPanel, we can't use virtualization anymore. That's a big problem for us.
